title: SIGSEGV at exit on master (80d4dac)
body:
Alacritty crashes (SIGSEGV) on exit

This issue was introduced with 80d4dac

The underlying issue is that the `zwp_primary_selection_device_manager_v1` object seen in the backtrace is destroyed after the wayland connection is here: https://github.com/Smithay/wayland-rs/blob/8581b9d298e3bfc872a598380a09eb386a9db408/wayland-backend/src/sys/client_impl/mod.rs#L1022

### System

OS: Arch Linux (6.5.8-arch1-1)
Version: alacritty 0.13.0-dev (80d4dac)
Linux: sway, Wayland

### Logs

Backtrace:
